item.title: Leetcode41. 缺失的第一个正数
item.description: 一、题意 题目链接：Problem 二、题解 三、代码 通过链接：Submission class Solution: def firstMissingPositive(self, nums: List[int]) -> int: for i in range(len(nums)): v = nums[i] while v > 0 and v <= len(nums) and (v - 1) != i and v != nums[v - 1]: nums[i] = nums[v - 1] nums[v - 1] = v v = nums[i] print(len(nums)) for i in range(len(nums)): print(nums[i], end=" ") for i in range(len(nums)): if nums[i] !
